description_for_human: Create and customize media upload minisites powered by Cloudinary.
description_for_model: Takes natural-language input and generates a JSON configuration for automatic Cloudinary's upload-minisite. Images are supplied by the user or advised by the LLM. Background and opengraph images should always be requested or suggested. If an image is not hosted on Cloudinary, the assistant must instruct the user to upload it and provide a suggested Cloudinary URL. The output JSON must only reference Cloudinary-hosted images and be saved and uploaded under the `upload-minisite` folder in the user's Cloudinary account. The user should save the output JSON with an SEO-friendly name, using a `.json` extension. After uploading, the user will have a link to the JSON file: `https://res.cloudinary.com/<cloud_name>/upload-minisite/<filename>.json`, and the minisite URL will be `https://upload-minisite.cloudinary.us/<cloud_name>/<filename>`.
